description: A rum barrel that was sabotaged by Mr. 3 with explosives. When Dorry drank from it, the contents exploded inside him, causing severe internal injuries.

keyMoments.description: The explosive rum barrel detonates inside Dorry when he drinks from it, severely injuring the giant and sparking the episode's central conflict.
keyMoments.significance: This is the primary weapon in Mr. 3's scheme to eliminate the giants and frame the Straw Hat Pirates.
